patterns: What are the features of this product?

patterns: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
responses: Typically, orders take 2-5 business days to arrive. You can track your order using the tracking number provided in your shipping confirmation email.
Yes, you can track your order using the tracking number provided in your shipping confirmation email.
Shipping costs are calculated based on the weight of your order and the destination. You can see the exact shipping cost for your order at checkout.
